testCase.name: Sidebar Component Basic Rendering renders without crashing
Sidebar Component Basic Rendering renders with default logo when no logo provided
Sidebar Component Basic Rendering renders custom logo when provided
Sidebar Component Basic Rendering renders custom header when provided
Sidebar Component Basic Rendering renders footer when provided
Sidebar Component Navigation Sections renders navigation sections with titles
Sidebar Component Navigation Sections renders navigation items with labels
Sidebar Component Navigation Sections renders navigation items with icons
Sidebar Component Navigation Sections renders badges when provided
Sidebar Component Navigation Sections renders links for items with href
Sidebar Component Navigation Sections renders buttons for items with onClick
Sidebar Component Item States applies active class to active items
Sidebar Component Item States applies disabled state to disabled items
Sidebar Component Item States handles click events on navigation items
Sidebar Component Collapsible Functionality renders collapse button when collapsible is true
Sidebar Component Collapsible Functionality does not render collapse button when collapsible is false
Sidebar Component Collapsible Functionality calls onToggleCollapse when collapse button is clicked
Sidebar Component Collapsible Functionality applies collapsed class when collapsed is true
Sidebar Component Collapsible Functionality hides section titles when collapsed
Sidebar Component Collapsible Functionality updates aria-label based on collapsed state
Sidebar Component Variants applies base variant class by default
Sidebar Component Variants applies compact variant class
Sidebar Component Variants applies minimal variant class
Sidebar Component Custom Styling applies custom className to sidebar
Sidebar Component Custom Styling applies custom className to navigation buttons
Sidebar Component Custom Styling applies item-specific className
Sidebar Component Render Props uses custom renderHeader when provided
Sidebar Component Render Props uses custom renderNavItem when provided
Sidebar Component Render Props uses section-level renderItem when provided
Sidebar Component Element Customization renders with custom root element
Sidebar Component Element Customization renders navigation items with custom element
Sidebar Component Accessibility has proper ARIA labels for collapse button
Sidebar Component Accessibility uses semantic navigation elements
Sidebar Component Accessibility maintains focus management for keyboard navigation
Sidebar Component Compound Components renders SidebarSection with title
Sidebar Component Compound Components renders SidebarItem with all props
Sidebar Component Compound Components renders SidebarItem as custom element
Sidebar Component Error Handling handles missing sections gracefully
Sidebar Component Error Handling handles empty sections array
Sidebar Component Error Handling handles items without icons
Sidebar Component Forward Ref forwards ref to the root element
SidebarMenu renders trigger and opens/closes menu
Sidebar Accordion Behavior toggles multiple sections independently
Sidebar Accordion Behavior hides section titles and disables toggling when sidebar is collapsed
Sidebar Accordion Behavior responds to collapsed prop changes and updates UI accordingly
